title: Simon Cowell 'tried to keep' Jenny Ryan in The X Factor: Celebrity
text:
Simon Cowell insists he ‘tried to keep’ Jenny Ryan from being eliminated the first time around (Picture: ITV)

Jenny Ryan made a triumphant return to The X Factor: Celebrity on Satruday but Simon Cowell insisted if it had been up to him, she never would have been eliminated in the first place.

The Chase star was initially axed by mentor Nicole Scherzinger but was sensationally brought back into the fold after a massive viewer backlash.

According to the Syco boss, however, the controversy was entirely the fault of Scherzinger and fellow judge Louis Walsh.

‘I never got a chance to say to Jenny, I tried to keep you in the competition,’ Cowell said live on air.

‘It was these two [Scherzinger and Walsh] who kicked you out.’

The Vixen performed a charged rendition of Conchita Wurst’s Eurovision-winning ballad Rise Like A Phoenix to a rapturous reception

It turned out to be a comeback for the ages, as the 37-year-old quizzing legend managed to bag the first of three ‘safe seats’ of the night, guaranteeing her a place in next week’s show and saving her from the public vote.

The Vixen gave a rousing performance of Conchita Wursts Rise Like A Phoenix Picture: Rex)

The 12 other contestants also took to the stage, and it was a mixed bag to say the least.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Fans were pleasantly surprised to see the Love Island supergroup perform an original song that actually turned out to be quite a bop and there’s no denying Vinnie Jones brought the house down, even if he did divide the opinion of those watching at home.

The competition also lost its first contestants tonight; chat show icon Ricki Lake was the first to leave following the results of the public vote.

It was then up to the judges to decide between actress Olivia Olson and journalist Martin Bashir over who would stay and who would go.

The former Love, Actually actress was eventually the second contestant axed, leaving the stage in floods of tears after both Scherzinger and Cowell decided to back Bashir.

The X Factor: Celebrity continues next Saturday on ITV.

description: Simon Cowell blames Nicole Scherzinger and Louis Walsh for Jenny Ryan's initial X Factor: Celebrity elimination as he 'tried to keep' her in.
